channel.title: Rep++ to Obscura
channel.description:
Album: Illegimitation Release date: March 2012
Tracklist: 1. ...and All Will Come to an End 2. Crucified 3. Fear 4. Immanent Desaster 5. Incarnated 6. Open the Gates 7. Headworm [b]8. Flesh and the Power it Holds (Death cover) 9. Piece of Time (Atheist cover) 10. How Could I (Cynic cover) [/b]
